# Commercial License for PyFaceAU

## Overview

PyFaceAU is available under a dual licensing model:

1. **Non-Commercial License**: Free for research, education, and personal use under CC BY-NC 4.0
2. **Commercial License**: Available for commercial applications (this document)

## When Do You Need a Commercial License?

You need a commercial license if you plan to:

- Use PyFaceAU in a commercial product or service
- Provide commercial services using PyFaceAU
- Use PyFaceAU within a for-profit organization
- Receive any form of monetary compensation related to your use of PyFaceAU
- Integrate PyFaceAU into proprietary software
- Use PyFaceAU for competitive analysis or business intelligence

## Non-Commercial Use (Free)

You DO NOT need a commercial license for:

- Academic research and publications
- Educational purposes (teaching, coursework)
- Personal projects and experimentation
- Non-profit organization use (charitable, educational, scientific)
- Open-source projects under compatible licenses

## Commercial License Benefits

A commercial license provides:

- ✓ Full rights to use PyFaceAU in commercial applications
- ✓ Right to modify and distribute within your organization
- ✓ Integration into proprietary products
- ✓ No attribution requirements in end-user facing materials
- ✓ Warranty and support options (depending on license tier)
- ✓ Priority bug fixes and feature requests
- ✓ Legal protection and indemnification

## License Tiers

### Startup License
- For companies with < $1M annual revenue
- Single product use
- Up to 5 developers
- Email support

### Professional License
- For established businesses
- Unlimited products
- Unlimited developers within one organization
- Priority email support
- SLA guarantees

### Enterprise License
- For large organizations
- Multi-subsidiary use
- Custom terms available
- Dedicated support channel
- On-premises deployment options
- Source code access

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Can I evaluate PyFaceAU before purchasing a commercial license?**
A: Yes, you may evaluate PyFaceAU for commercial viability for up to 30 days without a commercial license.

**Q: What happens if I need to stop my commercial license?**
A: You must cease all commercial use of PyFaceAU. Academic/non-commercial use remains available under CC BY-NC 4.0.

**Q: Can I get a perpetual license?**
A: Yes, perpetual licenses are available. Contact us for details.

**Q: Is the commercial license per-developer or per-organization?**
A: Licenses are per-organization (except Startup tier which has developer limits).

**Q: Do you offer discounts for startups or small businesses?**
A: Yes, see our Startup License tier for companies under $1M annual revenue.

## Terms and Conditions

Commercial licenses are subject to our standard commercial terms, which include:

- License grant and scope
- Warranty and liability limitations
- Support and maintenance terms
- Termination conditions
- Payment terms

Full terms provided upon license purchase.
